caption.p: Origin and evolution of ( A) SARS-CoV, ( B) MERS-CoV and ( C) SARS-CoV-2 in the various hosts. Initially all viruses existed in diverse bat species as CoV-related viruses (SARSr-CoV, MERSr-CoV and SARSr-CoV-2); sequential mutations and recombinations allow them to adapt to intermediate hosts and finally humans [ 15].
